item.title: Katie add a quote by Marcel Duchamp
item.description: "I force myself to contradict myself in order to avoid conforming to my own taste." -- Marcel Duchamp

item.title: Katie add a quote by Donald Barthelme
item.description: "The distinction between children and adults, while probably useful for some purposes, is at bottom a specious one, I feel. There are only individual egos, crazy for love." -- Donald Barthelme

item.title: Katie add a quote by Robert Walser
item.description: "With all my ideas and follies I could one day found a corporate company for the propagation of beautiful but unreliable imaginings." -- Robert Walser

item.title: Katie add a quote by Tove Jansson
item.description: "I ONLY WANT TO LIVE IN PEACE AND PLANT POTATOES AND DREAM!" -- Tove Jansson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Stefano Benni
item.description: "Oh, my father sighs, if only we had a screwdriver that could unscrew wrongheaded ideas; if only we had a hammer to drive home good intentions; if only we had a pipe wrench to tighten hearts in everlasting love; a saw that we could use to make a clean cut with the past!" -- Stefano Benni

item.title: Katie add a quote by Roland Barthes
item.description: "Henceforth I would have to cosent to combine two voices: the voice of banality (to say what everyone sees and knows) and the voice of singularity (to replenish such banality with all the Ã©lan of an emotion which belonged only to myself)." -- Roland Barthes

item.title: Katie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I would not know what the spirit of a philosopher might wish more to be than a good dancer." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Katie add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "Today our unsophisticated cameras record in their own way our hastily assembled and painted world." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Katie add a quote by Paul Goodman
item.description: "Humankind is innocent, loving, and creative, you dig? It's the bureaucracies that create the evil, that make Honor and Community impossible, and it's the kids who really take it in the groin." -- Paul Goodman

item.title: Katie add a quote by Fernando Pessoa
item.description: "There are ships sailing to many ports, but not a single one goes where life is not painful." -- Fernando Pessoa

item.title: Katie add a quote by Chogyam Trungpa
item.description: "Everyone loves something, even if it's only tortillas." -- Chogyam Trungpa
